item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 18, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Don’t blame neoliberalism for the rise of the hard right
2. French businesses court Le Pen after taking fright at left’s policies
3. Nvidia vaults past Apple and Microsoft as world’s most valuable company
4. John Lewis and Waitrose blame shoplifting surge on ‘greed not need’
5. Rutte clears biggest hurdle for top Nato job after winning Orbán’s backing
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 18, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
